name: Helix Drop
description:
Simple jump game, just jump down the helix.

Helix Drop features:
✓ Level based helix axes. Jump-drop through levels.
✓ There are various traps in the Helix.
✓ Control your ball, Jump down the helix quickly and safely.
✓ So, this is a Fast-paced, top-down jumping game & parkour game.
✓ Suitable for players who like agile and jumping games.
✓ Simple game, suitable for everyone.
✓ Touch and slide left and right to turn the helix.
✓ A game just takes a few minutes, you can play at any time.
✓ Jumping and enjoying the scenery along the way.
✓ Support both mobiles and tablets.
